sentences.sContent: Palm oil is an ingredient in an estimate third of all products on supermarket shelves, from biscuits and margarine to shampoo and confectionery.
sentences.sContent_eng: Palm oil is an ingredient in an estimate third of all products on supermarket shelves, from biscuits and margarine to shampoo and confectionery.
sentences.sCn: 在超市货架上，棕榈油是一种被估计使用率第三的食品配料，从饼干、人造黄油到洗发水到糖果都有它的足迹。

trans.tranOther: a yellow substance similar to butter but made from vegetable or animal fats, which you eat with bread or use for cooking
